comment: Smooth and rich, suprisingly good whisky

2 oz poured from a 180 ml bottle (NAS), purchased at a FamilyMart in Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan. Nice clear golden yellow. Aromas of caramel, toffee, booze, citrus, malt, spice. Tastes of caramel, toffee, some booze, citrus. Medium body with nice warming heat on the finish.
Peaty overtones, but really sweet and delicious.
Smooth, rich, and delicious.  This was my first Japanese whisky

nose:  Fruits & Caramel
taste: light, sweet, fruity with hints of oak, herbs & spice
finish:  long & sweet but a bit dry
